title: As a special case for DRP nonresidential activities to be developed as described under clause no
clause_text: As a special case for DRP nonresidential activities to be developed as described under clause no.5.3 and 5.6 of this Regulation& clause no. 4 & 7 Regulation No 33 (9) (A) shall be allowed to be developed without going through the process of the change of zone.
